quote: Reeha is a kind and professional dance instructor who ensures her students feel comfortable and confident by fostering a supportive environment. She breaks down difficult choreography clearly and is always willing to go over steps until everyone understands.
name: Saira T.

quote: Reeha is very passionate about dance and this is communicated through her teaching style as she explains everything in detail, ensures everyone understands and overall that you are enjoying. Getting to work with her in any capacity is always a pleasure.
name: Alyssa C.

quote: Reeha is a reliable, hardworking, dedicated dancer who is always striving to improve and develop her skills. She is a pleasure to work with!
name: Georgia C.

quote: Reeha has a lovely vibe that shines through when she dances and teaches. I thoroughly enjoyed her workshop. A great way to invest in health and self-love whilst having a great time!
name: Saloni
